view.title: Configure demand-driven/manual surge pricing
view.subtitle: Demand-pricing policy configured and verified through API + agent tools.

blocks.title: Owner Configure Demand Pricing completed
blocks.message: Demand-pricing policy configured and verified through API + agent tools.

resultPayload.note: Demand-pricing policy configured and verified through API + agent tools.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Overtime cost calculation". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Automatic extension if running long". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
